name: Chaotic Magic
description:
This is the first game I've made for a game jam, and I don't have a lot of experience in making games.  This game was made purely to see if I could make a game in a week. 

Chaotic Magic is an fps where instead of clicking to shoot, you must type to shoot .  You will venture into the Chaos Dimension , collecting new types of magic spells and defeating wacky enemies.  In the end, will you defeat the monster's king, or will the chaos overwhelm you, and let the monsters succeed?
